name: Run! It is following me
description:
Run from the black orb of TERROR as long as you can. Blue shards give you temporary speed. Collect coins for points.

Move with WASD and jump with SPACE. And note that you are playing a robot. He is not used to getting bumped. Bad things will happen ;)

This game is a submission for Coding Blocks Game Jam '22. Game was done in 2 days along with all assets. And I ran out of time for Sounds (:
